main event: A witness observed a lighted, cigar-shaped object that gradually diminished in size until it could no longer be seen.
interesting points: The object was yellow in color and about the size of a star.
The object made a humming sound.
The object seemed to be at a long distance and gradually diminished in size until the witness could no longer see it.
The witness provided a hand-drawn sketch showing an elongated, cigar-shaped object with a pointed tip and a trailing effect, indicating the object was moving.
The witness stated the object did not disappear but rather seemed to be at a long distance and gradually diminish in size.
